Scientific Affairs Asia-Japan-Australia
Facsimile Cover Sheet
To: Fax:
Richard Carchman Philip Morris, Richmond 1-804-274-2891
From:
Dr. Roger Walk
Address:
c/o Philip Morris Asia Inc. 852-2825-1459 852-2826-3817
Phone:
Fax:
Date:
March 20, 1997
Pages:
22 (including cover page)
Distribution:
1
Subject: Swiss Study Levi et al. 1997
Dear Richard,
Attached you will find for your consideration as a basis for Cathy's presentation:
1. A relative comprehensive draft review of the scientific publication. The review includes some of your and Mingda Zhang's comments.
2. A draft presentation highlighting the study results, listing critique of the study, and giving some recommendations.
In case this material is to be used with or without modifications for the actual presentation. we can transfer the Powerpoint file electronically via profs. It can be edited here or in Richmond. Then color overheads can be printed in Richmond.
Please let me know If I can be of further help with the review and the presentation draft. Who else should I send a copy of the draft review? Please keep me posted on the progress of this project.
Best regards, Roger
Roger Walk
